entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call is important to us. Please hold while we connect you to the next available agent.
Hello, thank you for calling VeloFit, my name is Alex. How can I help you today?
Hi Alex, I'm calling about an order I recently received. The bike I ordered arrived damaged. It looks like there's some shipping damage.
Oh, I'm so sorry to hear that your bike arrived damaged! Can you please provide me with your order number so I can pull up your information?
Okay, thank you. I see it here. Can you describe the damage you're seeing?
Well, the main thing is there's a pretty significant cracked frame. And one of the wheels is a bit of a wobbly wheel, like it's not on straight. It's definitely not safe to ride.

I understand. That definitely sounds unacceptable. I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience this has caused. At VeloFit, we strive for quality, and I'm very sorry that this happened. To resolve this issue immediately, I'd like to offer you a full refund for the bike. Would that be acceptable?
Yes, a refund would be great.

Excellent. I'll process that for you right away. Also, we'll arrange to have the damaged bike picked up. I'll email you a free label so you can easily return the damaged product at your convenience. No need to repack anything. Just have it ready for pickup when our carrier contacts you. It is completely at no cost to you.
A free label? That's fantastic, thank you so much!

You're very welcome! The refund should appear in your account within 5-7 business days. You will receive the email with the free label for the return within the next hour. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's everything. Thank you so much for your help, Alex! You've been great.
My pleasure! Thank you for choosing VeloFit. We appreciate your business. Have a wonderful day!
